channel.title: Any object to send midi/osc from the computer to axo via micro-usb port?
channel.description: Hello, noob here. Is there any object to send midi/osc from the computer to axo via micro-usb port? I want to control axo via my daw and not buy a midi interface and connect a cable.

item.title: Any object to send midi/osc from the computer to axo via micro-usb port?

item.source: Any object to send midi/osc from the computer to axo via micro-usb port?

item.title: Any object to send midi/osc from the computer to axo via micro-usb port?
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

@vectorselector

Is it you Aaron?

vectorselector:

Do you know if there is a way to send midi over the micro-usb port, or is it only possible with the physical DIN MIDI connector ?

I didn't find any "midi over usb" objects yet, is why I'm asking

For any midi output over the micro usb port, use the port called "usb device port 1", the last one in the selector.

Midi input should just work, you can't really set a specific input port. Maybe try the object called:
midi/in/monitor

That one shows any midi input, fed to Axoloti.

I think its missing the midi input selector. It would make using several midi controllers with one Axoloti much easier.

Jaffa

Read full topic
item.source: Any object to send midi/osc from the computer to axo via micro-usb port?

item.source: Any object to send midi/osc from the computer to axo via micro-usb port?

item.title: Any object to send midi/osc from the computer to axo via micro-usb port?
item.dc:creator: @servandisco servando barreiro
item.description:
@servandisco wrote:

if you send midi from your DAW to Axoloti, you will receive it via all the midi/ in options. notes, cc's .. That's exactly the way I use it .. I can even pipe the midi from my "komplete" controller so I can use all the fancy hi-res encoders to tweak parameteres in Axo. Axo doesn't have Osc (afaik) but you could use another app to convert osc into midi

Read full topic
